Dear Customer,
We want to remind you that, according to Port's Terms and Conditions, late returns of eBikes (exceeding 12 hours) will incur the following penalties:
- ¬£25 for the first late return.
- ¬£25 for the second late return.
- ¬£25 penalty and account suspension for any subsequent occurrences.
Due to frequent violations, we are now strictly enforcing these policies. For more details, please refer to the Terms & Conditions in the app (Profile > Terms & Conditions > Point 8 - LIABILITY).

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text:
You can now transfer your active weekly subscription to another hub ‚Äî if it has available slots.
üîÑ How It Works:
If you have an active subscription and tap on a different hub:
If the new hub has open weekly slots, you‚Äôll see the ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù button.
If it‚Äôs sold out, you‚Äôll only see ‚ÄúCheck hub details‚Äù, as before.
Tap ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù to:
View the new hub‚Äôs details.
Start the transfer process.
During the transfer:
Your current subscription will be cancelled.
A new one will start in the selected hub.
You‚Äôll receive a discount based on the unused time left on your original subscription.

comments.text: I have a penalty for not returning my bike on time. If I pay, can I use the same bike again and ride it back to the port?

comments.text: Once you pay the penalty, you will be able to use our services again. However, you cannot continue with the same bike for your ride back to the port. You‚Äôll need to start a new rental with a different bike.

Currently, our system requires starting a new rental once a penalty is paid, even if the bike still has battery.

comments.text: We‚Äôve checked your details and found that your bike was taken outside the 10 km allowed zone, which is why a ¬£25 penalty has been applied to your rental.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: Please make sure in the future to stay within the 10 km zone from your hub. When bikes are taken outside this zone and break down or get stuck, our recovery team has to travel extra distance, which increases operational costs.

I completely understand, sir we know riders often travel longer distances during deliveries.

However, our bikes are designed for use within a 10 km radius from the hub to ensure proper GPS connection, battery support, and recovery coverage if any issue occurs.

If you go beyond this range, the system automatically flags it and applies a penalty because recovery and maintenance become difficult outside the service zone.

We recommend planning your deliveries within the allowed area to avoid such charges in the future.

comments.text: Hi basically my question is if i rented a weeks hire and i used a bike now for like 11hours 59 mins and i just brought it back with 20 mins left if i go now rent after the 20 mins finishes will it be a fresh new 11 hours and 50 mins or do i have to wait longer to restart? (i bought the weekly rent for around 50 pounds)

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: You can start your new rental right away. Just to clarify, each bike has a 12-hour rental limit,  you‚Äôll need to return it within that timeframe to avoid a long rental penalty. Once you finish your previous rental, you can start a new one immediately without any waiting time.

comments.text:
You just have to tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the on-screen steps:
Ensure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code.
Scan the dock‚Äôs QR code.
The app will try to end the rental. If both QR codes are correct, the rental will end, and you‚Äôll see the rating screen. If not, the app will guide you to try again.

comments.text: I'm a port bike user.i wanna ask you a questions what would happen if cycle is stolen?

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: If your bike is stolen, it is your responsibility to recover it by tracking its location through the app. Please also ensure that you lock the bike before leaving it unattended to help prevent misuse or theft.

comments.text: No, once you lock the bike, it cannot be moved by anyone else as the wheel becomes jammed and the bike is immobilized.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Please note that if a bike is stolen, customers should contact us immediately. If you are unable to locate the bike through the app, we will do our best to provide its location. However, the bike must be recovered; otherwise, a penalty of ¬£2,500 will apply for a stolen bike, along with a ¬£25 penalty for exceeding the rental time limit. To help prevent theft or misuse, please always lock the bike before leaving it, even for a few seconds.

comments.text:
We're sorry to hear that your phone was lost. You're correct that you're unable to log in on your new device, as the OTP is sent to the phone number used for your previous account, which you no longer have access to.

Unfortunately, the phone number on an existing account cannot be changed. The only option is to create a new account using your new number, pay the activation fee, and purchase a new subscription to start a new rental.

comments.text: Yes, you can make the payment anytime.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: If I need the bicycle on  coming Friday and can I reserve it today?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: If you plan to use the service for just one day, you can choose to make the payment on the specific day you wish to ride.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: And what about the availability of bicycle?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text:
We offer subscriptions and passes with the goal of ensuring that bikes are available when customers arrive at a hub. While availability can sometimes vary depending on demand and location, our system is designed to keep bikes circulating so that all users have fair access.

If you're ever unable to find a bike at a hub, feel free to let us know and we‚Äôll do our best to assist.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Please let me know if there's anything else that I can assist you with.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: If I need it at 12pm afternoon on daily basis, how I can I assure that I will get the bike on hub?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text:
While we strive to have bikes available at hubs throughout the day, availability can sometimes vary due to demand and usage patterns.

If you need a bike consistently at 12 PM daily, we recommend planning a little ahead of time and arriving slightly earlier if possible. Additionally, subscribing to a pass or membership gives you priority access and can improve availability.

We‚Äôre constantly working to balance bike distribution to meet users‚Äô needs, and if you ever have trouble finding a bike at your preferred hub, please reach out we‚Äôre here to help.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: Is it possible that I made payment one day before and next day when I reached to specific hu, bicycle will be available for me?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: If you pay for a day pass, a day pass is active until 23:59, the same day when the pass was purchased.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: If you plan to use the bike at 12 PM, you can purchase the day pass starting from 12 AM on the same day. Please ensure that you buy the pass on the exact date you intend to use it, as the day pass expires at midnight when the date changes.

comments.text: Please note that we‚Äôre only able to assist when issues are reported in a timely manner. comments.text: As the rental is now force finished, even after paying the penalty, you won‚Äôt be able to access the same bike. To continue using our service, you‚Äôll need to start a new rental by unlocking another available bike from the hub.

comments.text:
We‚Äôve recently introduced a new feature in the PORT app that allows you to end your rental on your own if the dock doesn‚Äôt finish it automatically.
Here‚Äôs what to do next time:
Update the PORT app to the latest version (v1.29 or above).
If the bike doesn‚Äôt end the rental after docking, tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner of the screen.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the steps shown:
Make sure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike QR code.
Scan the dock QR code.
The app will try to complete the rental automatically.
If the QR codes are correct, the rental will end and you‚Äôll see the rating screen.
If not, the app will guide you to try again.

comments.text: We regret to inform you that your subscription could not be renewed due to insufficient balance. As a result, you will need to repurchase your subscription. comments.text:
Please note that subscriptions renew automatically every week unless you cancel it from your end. It works the same way other subscriptions work, like Netflix, Spotify, Apple TV, etc.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:72084a53-d864-4650-a6a3-3db25c18cc1a
comments.text: How can I rent it

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Allow me a moment please let me guide you step by step.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
If you‚Äôre a new customer and want to rent an electric bike, here‚Äôs how you can get started:

Download the Port App from the App Store or Google Play.

Create your account and add your payment method.

Choose your hub location in London where you want to rent from.

You can then select a daily pass (¬£12.95) or a weekly subscription, which gives you unlimited rides for 7 days (each ride up to 12 hours).

Once activated, simply go to your hub, scan the bike‚Äôs QR code in the app, and you‚Äôre ready to ride!

There‚Äôs no deposit or hidden fees, and all bikes are fully electric.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: If you have any questions regarding rental packages, rental policies, or anything related to the bikes, please feel free to let me know. I am here to help you. Thank you!

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: We didn‚Äôt hear back from you, therefore we are closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

12 hours maximum rental time: You can ride the same bike for a maximum of 12 hours. Before you cross the 12 hours limit you must return the bike and take another bike for another 12 hours. PLEASE DO NOT EXCEED 12 HOURS PER BIKE.

Don‚Äôt take bikes outside Central London (10km from the hub): You can ride the bike a maximum of 10 km away from the hub. Do not take bikes home outside the city center by public transport, etc.

Pay the penalty when purchasing your new weekly pass ( Penalty + 49.95 GBP subscription)

Please confirm you understand and will comply with what has been stated above.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:d199c5fe-ab26-4cb6-96b7-e01182041dba
comments.text:
Hi, I can see that there are currently no bikes available at my assigned hub (NCP Vintry).
I need to start work today, so I just wanted to check ‚Äî will bikes be available there later today, or is it likely to remain empty for the day?

If there won‚Äôt be any available soon, could you please transfer my subscription to NCP Bancroft Road instead? That location would be much more convenient for me to continue working.

Thank you very much for your help.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:d199c5fe-ab26-4cb6-96b7-e01182041dba
comments.text: Hi

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Sir you can transfer your subscription from one hub to another hub directly using the app.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:d199c5fe-ab26-4cb6-96b7-e01182041dba
comments.text: Okay I wasn‚Äôt aware of that thank you

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
We apologize for the inconvenience and the unavailability of bikes at your selected hub due to high demand. Please wait for a short while‚Äîbikes will be available soon.

If you are unable to wait and need a bike urgently, you have the option to transfer your subscription to another hub of your choice, depending on the availability of subscription slots. Alternatively, you may repurchase a subscription at your desired hub.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
What you need to know:
If you have a running subscription in one of the hubs and click on another one on the map AND it has available slots for weekly subscription, you'll see the button Transfer my subscription
If this hub doesn't have available slots and all weekly subscriptions are Sold out, this button will be replaced with a regular Check hub details - the way it worked before in the app
Clicking on the Transfer my subscription button will first take you one level deeper into Hub details page, and you will once again have Transfer my subscription button available
If you push the button, you'll see the Transfer Subscription screen that explains the logic
Existing subscription will be cancelled
You will get a new subscription started in a new hub
New subscription will be started with a discount applied equal to what you had "remaining" on the existing subscription
If you confirm with Got it button, you proceed to the checkout screen that once again says that you're buying a new subscription in the target hub, you pay Transfer fee and you get a discount pro-rated from previous subscription payment
When you push Pay button, you're taken to Stripe checkout screen and after success get shown a Transfer Successful screen.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please follow these steps you would be able to transfer your subscription thanks.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:d199c5fe-ab26-4cb6-96b7-e01182041dba
comments.text: That‚Äôs it for now thank you so much have a great day

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: You too have a great day thanks :)

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: We are closing this chat now, please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

comments.text:
We‚Äôve recently introduced a new feature in the PORT app that allows you to end your rental on your own if the dock doesn‚Äôt finish it automatically.
Here‚Äôs what to do next time:
Update the PORT app to the latest version (v1.29 or above).
If the bike doesn‚Äôt end the rental after docking, tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner of the screen.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the steps shown:
Make sure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike QR code.
Scan the dock QR code.
The app will try to complete the rental automatically.
If the QR codes are correct, the rental will end and you‚Äôll see the rating screen.
If not, the app will guide you to try again.

Important Reminder ‚Äì Rental Time Policy
We want to remind you that, according to Port's Terms and Conditions, returning eBikes **after the 12-hour rental limit results in the following penalties:
¬£25 ‚Äì First late return
¬£25 ‚Äì Second late return
¬£25 penalty + account suspension ‚Äì For any further violations
Due to multiple violations being reported recently, we are now strictly enforcing these rules to ensure fair and reliable access to all riders.
For more details, you can review the Terms & Conditions in the Port App:
Profile > Terms & Conditions > Point 8 - LIABILITY
We appreciate your cooperation in following the rental guidelines. Thank you for helping us maintain a smooth experience for all riders.

Here‚Äôs the Daily Pass Cancellation Policy for Port App:
‚úÖ Full Refund ‚Äì If the daily pass is cancelled within 3 hours of purchase and has not been used (no bike scanned).
‚úÖ 50% Refund ‚Äì If cancelled after 3 hours but before 9:00 PM (local time) on the same day and the pass is not used.
‚ùå No Refund ‚Äì If the cancellation request is made after 9:00 PM or within the last 3 hours before expiry, no refund will be issued.
If you're eligible based on the above, let us know‚Äîwe‚Äôll be happy to assist with the cancellation.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: I‚Äôm planning to get bike today as well, planning to start from 3pm

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: Each rental allows up to 12 hours of usage within the active subscription or pass period.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: But on app it‚Äôs appeared to return the bike in six hours

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: And it say‚Äôs unlimited

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: Could you please explain if I get a day pass and I‚Äôm willing to start my ride at 3pm do I have to return in within 12 hours

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: You purchased a day pass, and the day pass expires the same day at 11:59 PM. This doesn‚Äôt mean that you can only use the bike for 12 hours ‚Äî the 12-hour limit applies to a single rental. You can use a bike for up to 12 hours at a time, but you must return it to a hub after that period.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: The day you purchased the day pass, you could have utilized the remaining time on that same day. However, this is no longer possible now ‚Äî you cannot receive a refund or use the remaining rental time because your day pass has already expired on that day.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: No I‚Äôm not looking for refund.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text:
Just to clarify ‚Äî the Day Pass is valid until 11:59 PM on the same day (local time), regardless of what time you start your ride.
So even if you begin at 3 PM, your pass will end automatically at 11:59 PM that night.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: Alright I got it

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: Which pass goes for 24 hours?

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: I am only guiding you regarding the refund and rental time.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: There is no pass that allows you to use the bike for 24 hours continuously. If you are using a weekly subscription, you can use a bike for only 12 hours at a time. After 12 hours, you can go to the hub and exchange it for a new bike. You can keep using a new bike by scanning it again if you need it further."

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: Should you need further assistance, I am here to help.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: Alright weekly subscription is suitable for me

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: Thanks  for your help

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: Yes, you can exchange your bike after 12 hours, and we also have a monthly subscription available.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: Monthly and weekly subscriptions are the best options for you.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: In this subscription, you can exchange your bike anytime after 12 hours.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: You're welcome! üòä‚ú®

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e4bb718b-a560-4804-ab91-58cb64884d8a
comments.text: Yes I would go for weekly first and then if that works out I‚Äôll go for monthly

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: That sounds great! Starting with the weekly subscription is a good choice, and you can easily switch to the monthly plan once you‚Äôre comfortable.

comments.author: 712020:8b0efc81-b079-4c42-9fb9-2e6717e62c89
comments.text:
You just have to tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the on-screen steps:
Ensure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code.
Scan the dock‚Äôs QR code.
The app will try to end the rental. If both QR codes are correct, the rental will end, and you‚Äôll see the rating screen. If not, the app will guide you to try again.

comments.text: Sir, please be informed that you are required to return the bike to the same hub where you started your rental, regardless of the circumstances. As the renter, you are responsible for the bike until it is properly returned and the rental is ended at the original hub. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

comments.text: You have 10 hours remaining to return the bike to the hub at Q-Park Pimlico. Please do your best to return it on time to avoid any further issues. Thank you.

custom_fields.contact_reason: General information request about the service

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: Hlo sir

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Hi! Thanks for connecting with Port App üö≤

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: How can i help you?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: Can I get some info?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Absolutely, please let me know what information you need.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: What's process to get a delivery e bike on daily basis plz?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: Price, duration ?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: What's security status of bike?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: How to get and return?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: You can rent the bike for 12 hours using the daily pass, which costs ¬£12.95. Please ensure the bike is returned by 11:59 PM on the same day. Regarding the bike‚Äôs security, you can lock it through the app, preventing anyone else from unlocking it.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: Is there any documents to get the bike ?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: From where station cancelled I get it?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: Any date time can I get for one day?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Sir, please note carefully: if you purchase a daily pass at 11:00 PM, you will have only 1 hour left to use and return the bike, as the pass will still expire at 11:59 PM. To make full use of the 12-hour rental period, you should purchase the daily pass after 11:59 PM. Within those 12 hours, you may lock the bike, visit a hub, and even exchange it, but all usage must be completed within that 12-hour window.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:0ab35268-d04a-4c62-8a83-9edb8ea075c5
comments.text: What about the battery?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: You can start your rental through the app. Please make sure to return the bike to the same hub from which you started the rental.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: The bike‚Äôs battery level is shown by 5 white bars, each representing 20% of the charge. Please ensure you have enough battery to return the bike to the hub at the end of your rental. When fully charged, the bike can be used for up to 12 hours. If the battery level drops below 20% during your rental, you can return to the same hub and easily exchange the bike.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Let me know if you need any further assistance. üôÇ

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Since we have not received a response from you, we will now close this chat. Please feel free to reach out again by opening a new chat if you require any further assistance. Thank you!

comments.text: I‚Äôve checked and your rental time has already been exceeded. Please return the bike to the hub as soon as possible to avoid further penalties, which may be applied at any time.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text:
We want to remind you that, according to Port's Terms and Conditions, late returns of eBikes (exceeding 12 hours) will incur the following penalties:
- ¬£25 for the first late return.
- ¬£25 for the second late return.
- ¬£25 penalty with cancellation of ongoing pass/subscription without any refund, and account suspension for the third late return.
- Permanent account suspension.
Due to frequent violations, we are now strictly enforcing these policies. For more details, please refer to the Terms & Conditions in the app (Profile > Terms & Conditions > Point 8 - LIABILITY).
Thank you for your understanding.

comments.text: As you mentioned tomorrow is maintenance. Then, what if my rentals is time fall in between thes hour. Please let me know as i have schedule for swaping. And it comes between these hour.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Let me guide you on this.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: If you‚Äôd like to use the bike, please make sure to rent it from the hub before the maintenance period begins. After renting, you can lock and unlock it using Bluetooth, and you‚Äôll have up to 12 hours to return it, during this time, maintenance will already be completed.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:1bfd7505-9595-4812-98f7-a0df3b92d3a7
comments.text: I mean. Now i am going to swap. And it will finish in morning around 7:30 in between maintenance hour. So is it possible that i rent extra hour and then swap after maintenance is finished

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: It‚Äôs not permitted, but due to maintenance, you won‚Äôt be able to start a new ride. I recommend swapping the bike again at midnight to be on the safe side.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:1bfd7505-9595-4812-98f7-a0df3b92d3a7

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:1bfd7505-9595-4812-98f7-a0df3b92d3a7
comments.text: Thanks bye

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: I recommend swapping the bike at midnight, as after maintenance, you might not be able to start a new rental immediately, which could affect your work.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: The early announcement was made to help you manage your schedule and avoid any inconvenience.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Feel free to ask if you have any other concerns.

You just have to tap the three dots (¬∑¬∑¬∑) in the top-right corner.

Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code.
Scan the dock‚Äôs QR code.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:87079dbb-e943-42cb-a187-5f63b20f6803
comments.text: How to leave bike at port? What is the process

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Allow me a moment, let me guide you.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text:
You are required to return the bike to the same hub where you started your rental. Please park the bike in a white dock to properly end your rental.

According to our policy, the maximum rental period is 12 hours. After 10 hours, you will receive a reminder from the port to return the bike. Please keep an eye on both the rental time and battery level, as managing them is your responsibility.

If you experience any issues, it‚Äôs important that you contact us immediately. We‚Äôre here to help 24/7.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text:
Yes, we provide **electric bikes perfect for delivery work** ‚Äî reliable, fast, and with long battery life. ‚ö°

You can get started by:

1. Downloading the **Port App** from the Play Store or App Store
2. Creating your account and verifying your details
3. Selecting your nearest **Port Hub** (for example: Saba West India Quay, Q-Park Tower Bridge, NCP Bloomsbury, etc.)
4. Choosing a **Weekly or Daily subscription** to begin riding right away!

comments.text: If you require any additional information or assistance, please feel free to ask.

comments.text:
press the ‚ÄúLock‚Äù button in the app  you‚Äôll hear the bike‚Äôs rear wheel lock automatically. Always wait for the confirmation message in the app before leaving the bike.

Regarding charging your phone, our e-bikes are equipped with a wireless phone charging pad located on the handlebar. Simply place your phone (with wireless charging enabled) on the pad while riding  make sure it‚Äôs centered properly for a stable connection.

If it doesn‚Äôt start charging, please restart your app and ensure your phone supports wireless charging.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text:
We‚Äôve recently introduced a new feature that lets you end your rental yourself ‚Äî no need to wait for support if the dock doesn't finish it automatically.

Here‚Äôs how to use it:

1. After docking the bike, if the rental doesn‚Äôt end, tap the **three dots (‚ãÆ)** in the top-right corner of the app
2. Select **‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù**
3. Then follow these steps:

   * Make sure the bike is docked properly
   * **Scan the bike QR code**
   * **Scan the dock QR code**

The app will try to finish the rental automatically.
‚úÖ If successful, you‚Äôll see the rating screen.
‚ùå If it doesn‚Äôt work, the app will ask you to try again.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:4887573f-24d0-4951-84aa-a5a0bf204e74
comments.text: can u change my port

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Could you please provide a bit more detail about the issue so I can assist you accordingly?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Would you like to transfer your subscription from one hub to another? Thank you.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
What you need to know:
If you have a running subscription in one of the hubs and click on another one on the map AND it has available slots for weekly subscription, you'll see the button Transfer my subscription
If this hub doesn't have available slots and all weekly subscriptions are Sold out, this button will be replaced with a regular Check hub details - the way it worked before in the app
Clicking on the Transfer my subscription button will first take you one level deeper into Hub details page, and you will once again have Transfer my subscription button available
If you push the button, you'll see the Transfer Subscription screen that explains the logic
Existing subscription will be cancelled
You will get a new subscription started in a new hub
New subscription will be started with a discount applied equal to what you had "remaining" on the existing subscription
If you confirm with Got it button, you proceed to the checkout screen that once again says that you're buying a new subscription in the target hub, you pay Transfer fee and you get a discount pro-rated from previous subscription payment
When you push Pay button, you're taken to Stripe checkout screen and after success get shown a Transfer Successful screen.

If you have a running subscription in one of the hubs and click on another one on the map AND it has available slots for weekly subscription, you'll see the button Transfer my subscription
If this hub doesn't have available slots and all weekly subscriptions are Sold out, this button will be replaced with a regular Check hub details - the way it worked before in the app
Clicking on the Transfer my subscription button will first take you one level deeper into Hub details page, and you will once again have Transfer my subscription button available
If you push the button, you'll see the Transfer Subscription screen that explains the logic
Existing subscription will be cancelled
You will get a new subscription started in a new hub
New subscription will be started with a discount applied equal to what you had "remaining" on the existing subscription
If you confirm with Got it button, you proceed to the checkout screen that once again says that you're buying a new subscription in the target hub, you pay Transfer fee and you get a discount pro-rated from previous subscription payment
When you push Pay button, you're taken to Stripe checkout screen and after success get shown a Transfer Successful screen. ~C:can u change my port ~A:Please follow the steps below to transfer your current weekly subscription from one hub to another, depending on slot availability. You can now **transfer your weekly subscription to another hub**, if that hub has weekly slots available.

Here‚Äôs how it works:

1. Tap on a **different hub** on the map
2. If it has availability, you‚Äôll see a **‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù** button
3. Follow the steps shown in the app:

   * Your current subscription will be cancelled
   * A new one will start in the selected hub
   * You‚Äôll get a **discount based on the unused days/hours** from your current subscription
   * A **¬£5 transfer fee** applies for now

üîÅ This is perfect if your preferred hub becomes available after you‚Äôve already subscribed elsewhere!

Can you please remove this fine, considering that the bike was stolen and it wasn't my fault?

comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.text: I have checked and found that your rental has exceeded the allowed time limit, which is why your rental was automatically ended and a penalty has been applied to your account. Please note that this penalty cannot be waived.

comments.text: Sir, have you reached out to us about your stolen bike?

Important Reminder ‚Äì Rental Time Policy
We want to remind you that, according to Port's Terms and Conditions, returning eBikes **after the 12-hour rental limit results in the following penalties:
¬£25 ‚Äì First late return
¬£25 ‚Äì Second late return
¬£25 penalty + account suspension ‚Äì For any further violations
Due to multiple violations being reported recently, we are now strictly enforcing these rules to ensure fair and reliable access to all riders.
For more details, you can review the Terms & Conditions in the Port App:
Profile > Terms & Conditions > Point 8 - LIABILITY
We appreciate your cooperation in following the rental guidelines. Thank you for helping us maintain a smooth experience for all riders. üö≤

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
Here‚Äôs how you can rent a Port e-bike:

üö¥‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Download the Port App from the App Store or Google Play.

üìç Create your account and select your preferred hub location.

üí≥ Choose a plan  you can rent using a Daily Pass (¬£12.95) or a Weekly Subscription (¬£49.95).

üîì Unlock a bike by scanning the QR code on the e-bike through the app.

‚úÖ Enjoy your ride! Make sure to return and lock the bike at the same hub before your plan ends.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: A monthly subscription is also available. If you would like more details, please let me know. Thank you.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:df8f3759-f357-434b-aba9-ac1bce77354f
comments.text: Any place near to Action to visit them tomorrow

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
To choose a location on the map in the Port App, please follow these steps:

Open the Port App.

On the home screen, you'll see a map view with your current location.

You can zoom in or move around the map to see available hubs.

Tap on a hub pin to view details like available bikes and select it for your rental.

Once selected, you can start your rental from that location.

If you're having trouble finding a hub, make sure your location services (GPS) are enabled on your phone.

comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:6c6dff5d-ed7e-44bb-aae9-91f75bb8d652
comments.text: Hello I would like to change a hub to oxford circus and it‚Äôs not letting me do that on the app you do it from please

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Sir we are unable to transfer your subscription from one to hub another.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:6c6dff5d-ed7e-44bb-aae9-91f75bb8d652
comments.text: How can I do that

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: You can transfer your subscription directly through the app.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
What you need to know:
If you have a running subscription in one of the hubs and click on another one on the map AND it has available slots for weekly subscription, you'll see the button Transfer my subscription
If this hub doesn't have available slots and all weekly subscriptions are Sold out, this button will be replaced with a regular Check hub details - the way it worked before in the app
Clicking on the Transfer my subscription button will first take you one level deeper into Hub details page, and you will once again have Transfer my subscription button available
If you push the button, you'll see the Transfer Subscription screen that explains the logic
Existing subscription will be cancelled
You will get a new subscription started in a new hub
New subscription will be started with a discount applied equal to what you had "remaining" on the existing subscription
If you confirm with Got it button, you proceed to the checkout screen that once again says that you're buying a new subscription in the target hub, you pay Transfer fee and you get a discount pro-rated from previous subscription payment
When you push Pay button, you're taken to Stripe checkout screen and after success get shown a Transfer Successful screen.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please follow these steps and you will be able to transfer the subscription from one hub to another.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: We didn‚Äôt hear back from you, therefore we are closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

comments.text: Also at what time are port bijes available i know that you have to being it back before midnight but at what time in the morning can u use it again then?

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Please note that our hubs operate 24/7, and you can rent a bike at any time. However, you must return it within the 12-hour time limit. After returning one bike, you can immediately rent another if your pass or subscription is still active. With a full charge, the bike can be used for approximately 30‚Äì45 miles.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text:
*According to our policy, the maximum rental duration is 12 hours.*
Once your rental reaches 10 hours, you will receive a reminder from the port to return the bike within the remaining time frame.

Please make sure to:

* Keep an eye on the *battery level* and *rental time*, as managing both is your responsibility.
* *Do not leave the bike unattended*, as you are fully responsible for it during the rental period.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Please let us know if you need any further assistance, we're here to help you 24/7.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: We didn‚Äôt hear back from you, therefore, we are closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat. thanks!

comments.author: 712020:8b0efc81-b079-4c42-9fb9-2e6717e62c89
comments.text: Please note that it‚Äôs your responsibility to ensure the bike has enough battery to complete your return journey. While the bike can still be used with a low battery, its performance might be impacted.

comments.author: 712020:8b0efc81-b079-4c42-9fb9-2e6717e62c89
comments.text: When the battery drops below 7%, the motor will stop assisting, and the bike will become harder to ride. The rear wheel will still move, but without motor support. Please return the bike to the hub right away and get a new one as soon as possible.

Restart the app.
Tap the three dots (top-right) > ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù

Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code
Then scan the dock‚Äôs QR code
If scanned correctly, the rental will end automatically.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:89220050-4098-4591-b95c-d4c0930db5d0
comments.text:
Hi I‚Äôd like to transfer my bike subscription from Q-Park Oxford Street to Maidavale Park.
Could you please confirm if I‚Äôll need to pay again for the new hub, or if the remaining days from my current subscription will be deducted automatically?
Thank you!

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Let me guide you with this.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: When you transfer your subscription to a different hub, a transfer fee of ¬£5 applies. The value of your remaining subscription days and hours will be automatically deducted from the new subscription price, and you‚Äôll only need to pay the remaining amount along with the transfer fee.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:89220050-4098-4591-b95c-d4c0930db5d0
comments.text:
Thanks for the information!
Could you please show me the exact steps I need to follow in the app to transfer my subscription to Maidavale Park?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:89220050-4098-4591-b95c-d4c0930db5d0
comments.text: ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt see the hubs on the map right now.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: You currently have an ongoing rental. Once you return this bike to the same hub from where you rented it, you‚Äôll be able to transfer your hub.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text:
Here‚Äôs how to transfer your subscription step by step:

Update the app ‚Äì Make sure your app is updated to the latest version.

Open the map ‚Äì Find a nearby hub where you‚Äôd like to transfer your subscription.

Select the hub ‚Äì Tap on the hub. If weekly subscriptions are available there, you‚Äôll see the ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù option.

View hub summary ‚Äì A summary of the new hub will appear. Scroll down and tap ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù again.

Confirm payment ‚Äì You‚Äôll then be prompted to purchase a new weekly subscription for ¬£49.95.

Automatic deduction ‚Äì The unused amount from your current subscription will be automatically deducted.

Pay remaining balance ‚Äì You‚Äôll only need to pay the remaining balance along with a ¬£5 transfer fee.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8

merged_text:
~C:Hi I‚Äôd like to transfer my bike subscription from Q-Park Oxford Street to Maidavale Park.
Could you please confirm if I‚Äôll need to pay again for the new hub, or if the remaining days from my current subscription will be deducted automatically?
Thank you! ~A:Hey[image file] ~A:Let me guide you with this. ~A:When you transfer your subscription to a different hub, a transfer fee of ¬£5 applies. The value of your remaining subscription days and hours will be automatically deducted from the new subscription price, and you‚Äôll only need to pay the remaining amount along with the transfer fee. ~C:Thanks for the information!
Could you please show me the exact steps I need to follow in the app to transfer my subscription to Maidavale Park? ~C:‚ÄúI can‚Äôt see the hubs on the map right now. ~A:You currently have an ongoing rental. Once you return this bike to the same hub from where you rented it, you‚Äôll be able to transfer your hub. ~A:Here‚Äôs how to transfer your subscription step by step:

Update the app ‚Äì Make sure your app is updated to the latest version.

Open the map ‚Äì Find a nearby hub where you‚Äôd like to transfer your subscription.

Select the hub ‚Äì Tap on the hub. If weekly subscriptions are available there, you‚Äôll see the ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù option.

View hub summary ‚Äì A summary of the new hub will appear. Scroll down and tap ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù again.

Confirm payment ‚Äì You‚Äôll then be prompted to purchase a new weekly subscription for ¬£49.95.

Automatic deduction ‚Äì The unused amount from your current subscription will be automatically deducted.

Pay remaining balance ‚Äì You‚Äôll only need to pay the remaining balance along with a ¬£5 transfer fee. ~A:Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with. ~A:I didn‚Äôt hear back from you; therefore, I am closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat. Thanks!

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
We‚Äôve recently introduced a new feature in the PORT app that allows you to end your rental on your own if the dock doesn‚Äôt finish it automatically.
Here‚Äôs what to do next time:
Update the PORT app to the latest version (v1.29 or above).
If the bike doesn‚Äôt end the rental after docking, tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner of the screen.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the steps shown:
Make sure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike QR code.
Scan the dock QR code.
The app will try to complete the rental automatically.
If the QR codes are correct, the rental will end and you‚Äôll see the rating screen.
If not, the app will guide you to try again.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please follow the steps and you will be able to end your rental thanks.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:89220050-4098-4591-b95c-d4c0930db5d0
comments.text:
Hamza Pervaiz
CC-38967 Hi, I have rental #991731. Could you please change my pickup location from Q-Park Oxford Street to Maidavale Park? Let me know if that‚Äôs possible. Thank you!

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
What you need to know:
If you have a running subscription in one of the hubs and click on another one on the map AND it has available slots for weekly subscription, you'll see the button Transfer my subscription
If this hub doesn't have available slots and all weekly subscriptions are Sold out, this button will be replaced with a regular Check hub details - the way it worked before in the app
Clicking on the Transfer my subscription button will first take you one level deeper into Hub details page, and you will once again have Transfer my subscription button available
If you push the button, you'll see the Transfer Subscription screen that explains the logic
Existing subscription will be cancelled
You will get a new subscription started in a new hub
New subscription will be started with a discount applied equal to what you had "remaining" on the existing subscription
If you confirm with Got it button, you proceed to the checkout screen that once again says that you're buying a new subscription in the target hub, you pay Transfer fee and you get a discount pro-rated from previous subscription payment
When you push Pay button, you're taken to Stripe checkout screen and after success get shown a Transfer Successful screen.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please follow the steps and you will be able to transfer your subscription from one hub to another.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: We didn‚Äôt hear back from you, therefore we are closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

comments.text: My bike is dying and isn‚Äôt letting me pedal but I calculated the distance before my journey and it was fine I‚Äôm a long way away from Leicester Square q park am I amble dock at a closer dock

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Unfortunately, docking the bike in any other hub is not allowed and it would lead to a penalty on your account if you did so.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: When the battery drops below 7%, the motor will stop assisting, and the bike will be harder to ride. The rear wheel will still move, but without motor help.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Please note that it‚Äôs your responsibility to ensure the bike has enough battery to complete your return journey. While the bike can still be used with a low battery, its performance might be impacted. You can monitoe the battery level through the app, and avoid such issues.

comments.text: Please note that subscriptions renew automatically every week unless you cancel it from your end. It works the same way other subscriptions work, like Netflix, Spotify, Apple TV, etc.

custom_fields.contact_reason: General information request about the service

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: Alright, so are you facing any problem.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text:
To start a Rental, please follow the below steps;


# Install the Port app and sign up
# Select the hub that you want to use for your rentals on the map
# Check if there are available day passes or weekly subscriptions in the selected hub
# Pay for a weekly subscription or a day pass
# Start your rental by scanning QR code on any docking station in the selected hub

Please bear in mind:

* If you pay for a day pass, day pass is active until 23:59 same day when the pass was purchased
* You can rent bikes only in the hub that you selected while buying a pass or a subscription. Your access will not be active in other Port hubs
* You need to bring the bike back to the hub and lock it in any available dock. You are not allowed to leave your bike anywhere except the selected Port hub, each rental must be finished in the same location where it‚Äôs started
* Each rental has to be no longer than 12 hours. You can finish your rental and immediately take another bike and start the next rental, but each rental has a limit of 12 hours.

Let me know if you have other questions, I am happy to help.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text:
Please see below information regarding our e-bike rental service:

*Rental plans*: we offer weekly (7 complete days) and daily passes (expire every day at 23:59). You can use as many e-bikes as you need during the time of the subscription (one at a time). Our hubs are open 24/7.

*Price*: the price for weekly passes is 49,95 GBP and daily passes 12,95 GBP. Please check availability directly in out Mobile App


* *Pricing:* 3 tiers based on hub maturity and demand (159.95 - 169.95 - 179.95 GBP):
* *Monthly pricing:* 
*Tier 1 - ¬£159.95*
** Q-Park Tower Bridge
*** Saba Stratford
*** Saba West India Quay
*** Business Design Centre
* *Tier 2 - ¬£169.95*
** NCP Bloomsbury
*** NCP Clerkenwell
*** NCP Finsbury
*** NCP Vintry
*** ParkBee Lanark Road
*** Port Bancroft Road
*** Port Marcon Place
*** Port Randolph Street
* *Tier 3 - ¬£179.95*
** Q-Park Leicester Square
*** Q-Park Oxford street
*** Q-Park Queensway

*Conditions*: The e-bikes must be returned to the same hub from where it was rented after each use (12h maximum rental time). *Customers are not allowed to take e-bikes home overnight or leave them anywhere else than the hub from where they were rented. You can only rent 1 bike at a time*. To rent another bike you need to return the bike you have rented previously.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: Let me know If you need any further assistance.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text: Wait a few seconds ‚Äî the LED light on the dock should turn green (this means the bike is locked).

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text:
1. **Park the bike** on the kickstand near the charging station inside **
2. **Take the charging cable** from the charging station.
3. **Plug the cable** into the charging socket on the **left side of the front light** of the bike.

   * You should hear a *‚Äúclick‚Äù* when it connects properly.
4. **Check the LED on the charging plug**:

   * If it turns **green**, the bike is now locked, charging, and the rental is complete.
5. That‚Äôs it! You‚Äôre all set üö≤‚ö°

custom_fields.contact_reason: General information request about the service

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: Let me check your details, please allow me a moment.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text:
To start a Rental, please follow the below steps;


# Install the Port app and sign up
# Select the hub that you want to use for your rentals on the map
# Check if there are available day passes or weekly subscriptions in the selected hub
# Pay for a weekly subscription or a day pass
# Start your rental by scanning QR code on any docking station in the selected hub

Please bear in mind:

* If you pay for a day pass, day pass is active until 23:59 same day when the pass was purchased
* You can rent bikes only in the hub that you selected while buying a pass or a subscription. Your access will not be active in other Port hubs
* You need to bring the bike back to the hub and lock it in any available dock. You are not allowed to leave your bike anywhere except the selected Port hub, each rental must be finished in the same location where it‚Äôs started
* Each rental has to be no longer than 12 hours. You can finish your rental and immediately take another bike and start the next rental, but each rental has a limit of 12 hours.

Let me know if you have other questions, I am happy to help.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text:
Please see below information regarding our e-bike rental service:

*Rental plans*: we offer weekly (7 complete days) and daily passes (expire every day at 23:59). You can use as many e-bikes as you need during the time of the subscription (one at a time). Our hubs are open 24/7.

*Price*: the price for weekly passes is 49,95 GBP and daily passes 12,95 GBP. Please check availability directly in out Mobile App


* *Pricing:* 3 tiers based on hub maturity and demand (159.95 - 169.95 - 179.95 GBP):
* *Monthly pricing:* 
*Tier 1 - ¬£159.95*
** Q-Park Tower Bridge
*** Saba Stratford
*** Saba West India Quay
*** Business Design Centre
* *Tier 2 - ¬£169.95*
** NCP Bloomsbury
*** NCP Clerkenwell
*** NCP Finsbury
*** NCP Vintry
*** ParkBee Lanark Road
*** Port Bancroft Road
*** Port Marcon Place
*** Port Randolph Street
* *Tier 3 - ¬£179.95*
** Q-Park Leicester Square
*** Q-Park Oxford street
*** Q-Park Queensway

*Conditions*: The e-bikes must be returned to the same hub from where it was rented after each use (12h maximum rental time). *Customers are not allowed to take e-bikes home overnight or leave them anywhere else than the hub from where they were rented. You can only rent 1 bike at a time*. To rent another bike you need to return the bike you have rented previously.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: Let me know if you still have any questions.

comments.text:
We‚Äôve recently introduced a new feature that lets you end your rental yourself ‚Äî no need to wait for support if the dock doesn't finish it automatically.

Here‚Äôs how to use it:

1. After docking the bike, if the rental doesn‚Äôt end, tap the **three dots (‚ãÆ)** in the top-right corner of the app
2. Select **‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù**
3. Then follow these steps:

   * Make sure the bike is docked properly
   * **Scan the bike QR code**
   * **Scan the dock QR code**

The app will try to finish the rental automatically.
‚úÖ If successful, you‚Äôll see the rating screen.
‚ùå If it doesn‚Äôt work, the app will ask you to try again.

comments.text:
You just have to tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner.

Ensure the bike is docked properly.

Follow these steps to end your rental forcefully through your end.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:3e29e3ea-f878-4a4f-9f78-a5e84005e4f0
comments.text: Hi

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Hi! Thanks for connecting with Port App üö≤

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: How can we help you?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:3e29e3ea-f878-4a4f-9f78-a5e84005e4f0
comments.text: I would like to rent an electric bike. Can you tell me the requirements?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Sure, welcome to the Port app, I'm here to assist you.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text:
To start a Rental, please follow the below steps;


Install the Port app and sign up

Select the hub that you want to use for your rentals on the map

Check if there are available day passes or weekly subscriptions in the selected hub

Pay for a weekly subscription or a day pass

Start your rental by scanning QR code on any docking station in the selected hub

Please bear in mind:

If you pay for a day pass, day pass is active until 23:59 same day when the pass was purchased

You can rent bikes only in the hub that you selected while buying a pass or a subscription. Your access will not be active in other Port hubs

You need to bring the bike back to the hub and lock it in any available dock. You are not allowed to leave your bike anywhere except the selected Port hub, each rental must be finished in the same location where it‚Äôs started

Each rental has to be no longer than 12 hours. You can finish your rental and immediately take another bike and start the next rental, but each rental has a limit of 12 hours.

Let me know if you have other questions, I am happy to help.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:3e29e3ea-f878-4a4f-9f78-a5e84005e4f0
comments.text: How much is the weekly and monthly subscription and are bikes available in Birmingham?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: The weekly subscription is for 49.95 GBP.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
We‚Äôve recently introduced a new feature in the PORT app that allows you to end your rental on your own if the dock doesn‚Äôt finish it automatically.
Here‚Äôs what to do next time:
Update the PORT app to the latest version (v1.29 or above).
If the bike doesn‚Äôt end the rental after docking, tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner of the screen.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the steps shown:
Make sure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike QR code.
Scan the dock QR code.
The app will try to complete the rental automatically.
If the QR codes are correct, the rental will end and you‚Äôll see the rating screen.
If not, the app will guide you to try again.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text:
Dear Fatima,

Thank you for reaching out, and I‚Äôm very sorry to hear about your accident. We hope you are receiving the care you need and wish you a full and speedy recovery.

To assist you properly and support our incident reporting process, could you please provide the following details at your earliest convenience:

# *Medical Documentation* ‚Äì Please share any relevant medical documents or a hospital discharge note confirming the incident and the injuries sustained.
# *Details About the Accident* ‚Äì Can you describe what happened during the accident, including the location, date, and time?
# *Condition of the Bike* ‚Äì Do you know if the rental bike has been damaged? If so, could you describe the extent of the damage?
# *Police or Incident Report* ‚Äì If any authorities were involved or if a report was filed, please forward us a copy or reference number.

We understand that your phone is currently broken, but if you‚Äôre able to provide any additional details or photos through another device or email account, it would be very helpful.

comments.author: 712020:8f5c3870-9bb6-4299-922f-e6f38426666b
comments.text:
Dear Fatima,

We would like to inform you that your rental has been finished as it exceeded the allowed duration. A *¬£25 penalty* has been applied to your account.

Once you provide your medical document, our team will review your case and update you with further information accordingly.

We will now close this email. If you need any more help, please feel free to open a new chat.

Thank you for using *Port App!üö≤*

Best regards,
*Port App Support Team*

Choose your hub location in London where you want to rent from.

There‚Äôs no deposit or hidden fees, and all bikes are fully electric.

‚Ä¢ Check if there are available day passes or weekly subscriptions in the selected hub
‚Ä¢ Pay for a weekly subscription or a day pass
‚Ä¢ Start your rental by scanning the QR code on any docking station in the selected hub
‚Ä¢ Please bear in mind:
‚Ä¢ If you pay for a day pass, the day pass is active until 23:59 same day when the pass was purchased you can rent bikes only in the hub that you selected while buying a pass or a subscription, your access will not be active in other Port hubs.

user_summary: Hello, I would like to change my hub

custom_fields.contact_reason: Request to transfer subscription/pass to a different hub

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:00bb314e-1a3d-4ce7-8e95-d3a9e80eb621
comments.text: Hello, I would like to change my hub

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
What you need to know:
If you have a running subscription in one of the hubs and click on another one on the map AND it has available slots for weekly subscription, you'll see the button Transfer my subscription
If this hub doesn't have available slots and all weekly subscriptions are Sold out, this button will be replaced with a regular Check hub details - the way it worked before in the app
Clicking on the Transfer my subscription button will first take you one level deeper into Hub details page, and you will once again have Transfer my subscription button available
If you push the button, you'll see the Transfer Subscription screen that explains the logic
Existing subscription will be cancelled
You will get a new subscription started in a new hub
New subscription will be started with a discount applied equal to what you had "remaining" on the existing subscription
If you confirm with Got it button, you proceed to the checkout screen that once again says that you're buying a new subscription in the target hub, you pay Transfer fee and you get a discount pro-rated from previous subscription payment
When you push Pay button, you're taken to Stripe checkout screen and after success get shown a Transfer Successful screen.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please follow the steps and you will be able to transfer your subscription from one hub to another thanks.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:00bb314e-1a3d-4ce7-8e95-d3a9e80eb621
comments.text: No thanks

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: We are closing this chat now, please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

user_summary: I lost my phone on Friday, so I couldn't return the bike.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: I lost my phone on Friday, so I couldn't return the bike.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: It's not my fault. How do I scan it and go back to drop it off?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: Please help me and get this penalty reduced please!

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Allow me a moment please let me check it for you.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: I know there's a penalty for returning a bicycle. If I'd known, I wouldn't have done it.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: I have checked and found that your rental has exceeded the allowed time limit, which is why your rental was automatically ended and a penalty has been applied to your account. Please note that this penalty cannot be waived.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: Why can't it be done? It's not my fault. My phone was stolen. How can I get my bicycle back?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please leave the bike in a safe and accessible location. Our recovery team will retrieve it from there. Once you have paid the penalty, you will be able to take a new bike from the hub. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: If you can't even help this much then what's the point of riding this bicycle?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please note that you must contact us before your rental period is exceeded. You can reach us via email if this situation arises.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: How could I send you a message or an email? I didn't even have a phone. I bought a new phone today, removed my old SIM card, and now I'm texting you. I've been very upset for quite some time.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: We are not responsible for personal belongings. I am truly sorry about your situation, and I understand that it is not your fault, nor is it ours, if your phone was stolen. Have you reported the incident to the police? You may contact us through your friend‚Äôs account. Please note that in such cases, the penalty cannot be waived.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: I tried it on my friend's phone. My email was already open on the previous phone, and it was asking for an OTP to log in on this phone. I didn't have my phone number. Therefore, my account wouldn't log in, and I couldn't contact you.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: üòî

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: You're not helping me at all, and what's the point of this helpline if you can't even help anyone?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: I understand your situation. However, please note that we can only assist in these cases if you contact us immediately. Since the rental period has already been exceeded and you are unable to log into your account, you may create a new account or use a friend‚Äôs account to reach out to us. We are sorry to hear about your experience, but please be aware that the penalty cannot be waived.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:db595768-d129-4eb2-b11a-c1c585afb262
comments.text: No

comments.text: We are closing this chat now, please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

comments.text: Hi, I have rental #991731. Could you please change my pickup location from Q-Park Oxford Street to Maidavale Park? Let me know if that‚Äôs possible. Thank you!

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Hey[image file]üö≤

comments.text: Allow me a moment let me check your details.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: I‚Äôve checked your account and can confirm that you have an active subscription for Q-Park Oxford Street. You can transfer your hub location to another hub that suits you better using the method I‚Äôll provide. If the new hub has an available slot, you‚Äôll be able to secure it successfully.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text:
If you‚Äôd like to transfer your hub, please make sure your app is updated to the latest version. Then, find a nearby hub on the map and tap on it. If weekly subscriptions are available at that hub, you‚Äôll see a ‚ÄòTransfer my subscription‚Äô option just tap on it. A summary of the new hub will appear; scroll to the bottom and tap ‚ÄòTransfer my subscription‚Äô again.
After that, you'll be prompted to purchase a new weekly subscription for ¬£49.95. The unused amount from your current subscription will be deducted from this price, and you‚Äôll only need to pay the remaining balance along with a ¬£5 transfer fee.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: We haven't heard back from you, so we are closing this chat now. Please feel free to let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat. Thank you for using Port App!üö≤

comments.text: I will take the bike at7:00am and I will return it 12:00pm how much money should I pay?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Welcome to the Port app, sir! Yes, you can easily purchase a daily pass and use it for one day. I‚Äôd also be happy to assist you with the daily pass policy. Additionally, you can review the terms and conditions directly in your Port app.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Sir, please note carefully: if you purchase a daily pass at 11:00 PM, you will have only 1 hour left to use and return the bike, as the pass will still expire at 11:59 PM. To make full use of the 12-hour rental period, you should purchase the daily pass after 11:59 PM. Within those 12 hours, you may lock the bike, visit a hub, and even exchange it, but all usage must be completed within that 12-hour window

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: The price for a daily pass is ¬£12.95, while the weekly pass is ¬£49.95.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Let me know if you need any further assistance.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Since we have not received a response from you, we will now close this chat. Please feel free to reach out again by opening a new chat if you require any further assistance. Thank you!

Ensure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Is 1 day pass for 24 hours?

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Need human

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: No, one 1 day pass is only active for the same date and expires at 11:59PM same date.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: If you pay for a day pass, the day pass is active until 23:59 same day when the pass was purchased you can rent bikes only in the hub that you selected while buying a pass or a subscription, your access will not be active in other Port hubs

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Okk. And will i have to put the bike at the same docking station?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Yes, you will have to return the bike back to the same hub that you took it from.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: And will i get the fully working bike and with full charge?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Also what is the range of this bike?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: That depends on the availability at the hub as the bikes are used through the day so, the battery health of the bikes available at the hub depends on it as well.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Each bike has a range of 50-60 miles on a full charge.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Can i choose which bike do i want or system decides that?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: You can choose whatever bike you want at the hub.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: If the range is over and day is not. Can I swap the bike from same docking?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Yes, while you have an active day pass you can swap the bikes as per your preference.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Can i lock the bike for 5-10 minutes while order is being prepared?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Unattended

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Yes, make sure to lock the bike properly while leaving it unattended to avoid it from being stolen.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Are there any travel pr parking zones for this bike?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Or**

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Unfortunately, no there aren't. You can park the bike in a safe area and not leave it unattended for an extended period of time.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Will i get the lock or i will have to get it?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: You can lock the bike from the app.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:84619283-bd73-4d69-9ed1-94181219a676
comments.text: Thank you for answering all of my questions today.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text:
You're welcome, that's what we're here for! 
Let me know if there's anything else that I can help clarify.

With 6% battery, it should still be more than enough to complete the return.

comments.text: Hi

comments.text: Hi! Thanks for connecting with Port App üö≤
