comments.text: Please can you lock the bike ?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: How can we help you?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Please refresh the app and try to lock the bike from your end. Kindly let me know if the issue persists afterward.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e99ff758-ebdc-4e5b-9f20-a206bae77115
comments.text: Someone stole it and it riding it

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Thank you for your patience. I understand that your bike has been stolen. Let me assist you in resolving this issue.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: We have checked and noticed that your bike is currently in motion. While the bike is moving, we are unable to lock it remotely. Please be patient and wait until the bike comes to a complete stop (when the meter reaches zero). At that point, we will be able to lock the bike and will notify you once this has been done.

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: In the meantime, please keep an eye on the bike and lock it immediately once it comes to a stop. We are also monitoring the bike from our side.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e99ff758-ebdc-4e5b-9f20-a206bae77115
comments.text: Is still in motion?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Yes, sir, the bike is still in motion. Could you please let me know why the bike was not locked before you left?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e99ff758-ebdc-4e5b-9f20-a206bae77115
comments.text: I went to pick up a order from the restaurant I thought they will be quick to hand it over because the bike was not far from the restaurant

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: You still have the option to lock the bike, which takes only a few seconds. Please ensure in the future that the bike is locked before leaving, as it is the customer‚Äôs responsibility. We trust that next time you will lock the bike properly instead of leaving it unlocked.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e99ff758-ebdc-4e5b-9f20-a206bae77115

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e99ff758-ebdc-4e5b-9f20-a206bae77115
comments.text: Once located the bike. Can I call the police If I find that the theft has hidden it inside the property?

comments.author: 712020:0f747479-10c0-4ae9-8ae7-7531f3554784
comments.text: Once you recover the bike, it‚Äôs up to you if you want to call the police.

comments.text:

Kindly go and recover the bike as soon as possible, and please notify us in this chat once you have recovered it.

comments.text: No worries at all, sir. We would appreciate it if you could avoid making the same mistake next time.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text:
You can now end your rental yourself if the bike is docked but the session doesn't close.
How to use it:
Restart the app.
Tap the three dots (top-right) > ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the steps:
Dock the bike properly
Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code
Then scan the dock‚Äôs QR code
If scanned correctly, the rental will end automatically.

user_summary: How many times I can switch with different bike for the day?

custom_fields.contact_reason: General information request about the service

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:b87ab9a2-1ed7-4f2c-af65-2398ef709e8d
comments.text: How many times I can switch with different bike for the day?

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: As many as you want!

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:b87ab9a2-1ed7-4f2c-af65-2398ef709e8d
comments.text: Okay thank you

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Once one bike is returned you can immediatley rent another one.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: But you can not rent a bike more than 12 hours, as it's a maximum rental time limit for one bike. You can only rent one bike at a time.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:b87ab9a2-1ed7-4f2c-af65-2398ef709e8d
comments.text: It‚Äôs 12 hours for the day?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:b87ab9a2-1ed7-4f2c-af65-2398ef709e8d
comments.text: Sorry to bother you probably it was on the first page when I purchased the plan but I was rushing cuz my battery was low

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text:
No, the day pass does not cover a full 24 hours. It is only valid for the day you purchased it.

Please note that the day pass expires at 11:59 PM on the same day of purchase, regardless of whether you buy it at 5 PM or 11 PM.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: The 12-hour time limit applies to each bike. Once you return a bike, you can immediately rent another one, and a new 12-hour timer will start. However, once your pass or subscription expires, you must return the bike as soon as possible.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Feel free to let me know if you have any other concerns.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:b87ab9a2-1ed7-4f2c-af65-2398ef709e8d
comments.text: So I buy for 7 days and I can use the bike as long as I want but when I reach 12 hours then I need to bring back the bike and I can take another in case I need to use it for another 1 or 2 hours?

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Exceeding rental time is not allowed, you must return the bike within the maximum rental time limit, if you want to use bike for more hours. Then return that bike and take another one from the same hub the maximum rental, the rental time will refresh.

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: Do you need assistance with anything else?

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text: I didn‚Äôt hear back from you; therefore, I am closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat. Thanks!

comments.text:
The Hub is located at Unit 76, just off Randolph Street.
1. Follow the one-way street (Randolph Street), then take an immediate left under the bridge. You‚Äôll see a black gate.
2. If the gate is closed, you can find the access code in the app under the ‚ÄúHub Access‚Äù tab. Enter on the Pad-Lock, push button to open and pull.
3. Once inside the gate, continue straight down the road until you reach Unit 76.
The keypad entry code for the unit is also available in the ‚ÄúHub Access‚Äù section of the app.

comments.text: The docking system is not working

comments.author: 712020:ea5c67ac-c61f-45bd-b83e-f9092916cbb8
comments.text:
Sure! Please end your rental force fully through your end. 
You just have to tap the three dots (¬∑¬∑¬∑) in the top-right corner.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the on-screen steps:
Ensure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code.
Scan the dock‚Äôs QR code.
The app will try to end the rental. If both QR codes are correct, the rental will end and you‚Äôll see the rating screen. If not, the app will guide you to try again.

comments.text: Sir, I have checked and it appears that your payment was not completed. You attempted to purchase the subscription, but the transaction failed because it was incomplete. Please complete the 3D authentication process and try again to purchase the subscription. Thank you.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
3D authentication, also known as 3D Secure, is an extra layer of security for online card payments. It helps protect you from unauthorized transactions by requiring you to verify your identity during the payment process. This usually involves entering a one-time password (OTP) sent to your phone or confirming the transaction through your bank‚Äôs app. Common examples include ‚ÄúVerified by Visa‚Äù and ‚ÄúMastercard SecureCode.‚Äù

This process ensures that only the cardholder can complete the transaction, making online payments safer.

comments.text: I registered to the ncp Finsbury hub which was by accident. Could you kindly move me over to the vintry hub.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: You can transfer your subscription to one hub to another.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
What you need to know:
If you have a running subscription in one of the hubs and click on another one on the map AND it has available slots for weekly subscription, you'll see the button Transfer my subscription
If this hub doesn't have available slots and all weekly subscriptions are Sold out, this button will be replaced with a regular Check hub details - the way it worked before in the app
Clicking on the Transfer my subscription button will first take you one level deeper into Hub details page, and you will once again have Transfer my subscription button available
If you push the button, you'll see the Transfer Subscription screen that explains the logic
Existing subscription will be cancelled
You will get a new subscription started in a new hub
New subscription will be started with a discount applied equal to what you had "remaining" on the existing subscription
If you confirm with Got it button, you proceed to the checkout screen that once again says that you're buying a new subscription in the target hub, you pay Transfer fee and you get a discount pro-rated from previous subscription payment
When you push Pay button, you're taken to Stripe checkout screen and after success get shown a Transfer Successful screen.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please follow these steps you will be able to transfer your subscription from one hub to another thanks.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:2cde3355-6e79-49ad-afb1-7071e4a414f0
comments.text: Why am I having to pay

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Please note, sir, that there is a transfer fee of ¬£5 for processing the transaction.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:2cde3355-6e79-49ad-afb1-7071e4a414f0
comments.text: Ok

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else you want to know or I can assist you with?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:2cde3355-6e79-49ad-afb1-7071e4a414f0

comments.text: You're welcome :)

comments.text: Allow me a moment please let me guide you step by step.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
Here‚Äôs how it works:

The monthly plan gives you unlimited access to our e-bikes for 30 days from the activation date.

Each ride can last up to 12 hours, and the bike must be returned to the same hub where the rental started.

You can start and return the bike any time during hub operating hours, as all hubs are available 24/7.

Monthly subscriptions are available at different prices depending on the hub location ‚Äî starting from ¬£159.95 up to ¬£179.95.

comments.text: How to

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
Open the Port App.

On the home screen, you'll see a map view with your current location.

You can zoom in or move around the map to see available hubs.

Tap on a hub pin to view details like available bikes and select it for your rental.

Once selected, you can start your rental from that location.

If you're having trouble finding a hub, make sure your location services (GPS) are enabled on your phone.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
We‚Äôve recently introduced a new feature in the PORT app that allows you to end your rental on your own if the dock doesn‚Äôt finish it automatically.
Here‚Äôs what to do next time:
Update the PORT app to the latest version (v1.29 or above).
If the bike doesn‚Äôt end the rental after docking, tap the three dots (‚ãÆ) in the top-right corner of the screen.
Select ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the steps shown:
Make sure the bike is docked properly.
Scan the bike QR code.
Scan the dock QR code.
The app will try to complete the rental automatically.
If the QR codes are correct, the rental will end and you‚Äôll see the rating screen.
If not, the app will guide you to try again.

comments.text: Hi if i rent bicycle for one day and if my battery dies can i change that woth another port bike

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:915123a2-aeaa-4fff-bec8-67911c531074
comments.text: If i rent a bike for one day and battery discharges so can i take another port bike fro station?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Yes, you can take a new bike from the hub. We recommend returning your current bike when the battery health drops to 20% or 30%. As long as you have an active daily pass or weekly subscription, you are eligible to pick up a new bike from the hub. Thank you!

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: It is possible to transfer your monthly subscription to another hub; however, this depends on the availability of monthly slots at the new hub. If the hub is already sold out for monthly subscriptions, the transfer cannot be processed until a slot becomes available.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: Let me know If you need any further assistance.

comments.text: Hi

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: How can I help you?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:9a4c541e-9e9e-46dc-99e5-67c57d56b17b
comments.text: How to rent

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Allow me a moment please let me guide you step by step how to rent a bike from Port.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Sir, please note that you are required to purchase a subscription. We offer three different packages: a weekly subscription, a daily pass, and a monthly subscription.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: The daily pass costs ¬£12.95 and expires at 11:59 PM on the day of purchase. The weekly subscription is priced at ¬£49.95 and is valid for 7 days from the time of purchase. Monthly subscriptions are available at different prices depending on the hub location, starting from ¬£159.95 up to ¬£179.95. The monthly subscription works the same way as the weekly subscription, but it expires one month after the purchase date.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: There is a standard activation fee of ¬£25, but we are currently offering a discounted rate, allowing you to activate your account for just ¬£1. This is a one-time, non-refundable, lifetime activation fee. Thank you.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: You can pick up a bike from any hub, as all hubs are open and available 24/7. Simply scan the bike‚Äôs QR code using the app to start your rental. Each rental lasts for 12 hours, so please make sure to return the bike to the hub before the 12-hour time limit expires.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: You can pick up a bike from the hub where you purchased your subscription. Additionally, all available hubs are displayed in the app. Please enable your location services in the app to easily find the hub nearest to you.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: We didn‚Äôt hear back from you, therefore we are closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: However, when the rental time limit is exceeded, the system automatically ends the rental, and we are unable to unlock the bike ourselves. As a result, we have to recover the bike by loading it onto a truck, which increases our operational costs. Additionally, during this time, the bike is not available at the hub, which affects overall bike availability. Thank you for your understanding.

comments.text: Please note that by purchasing a subscription, you are agreeing to our terms and conditions. It is entirely up to the customer to decide whether or not they wish to purchase a subscription.

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text: Our service does not allow you to keep a single bike for an entire week. Each bike has a 12-hour rental time limit, so you must return the bike within 12 hours, even if you have a weekly subscription. Having a weekly subscription means you can rent bikes throughout the week, but you are still required to return each bike within the 12-hour limit. You cannot keep one bike for 7 days straight.

Therefore, penalties are applied according to policy and cannot be waived.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text:
To start a Rental, please follow the below steps;


# Install the Port app and sign up
# Select the hub that you want to use for your rentals on the map
# Check if there are available day passes or weekly subscriptions in the selected hub
# Pay for a weekly subscription or a day pass
# Start your rental by scanning QR code on any docking station in the selected hub

Please bear in mind:

* If you pay for a day pass, day pass is active until 23:59 same day when the pass was purchased
* You can rent bikes only in the hub that you selected while buying a pass or a subscription. Your access will not be active in other Port hubs
* You need to bring the bike back to the hub and lock it in any available dock. You are not allowed to leave your bike anywhere except the selected Port hub, each rental must be finished in the same location where it‚Äôs started
* Each rental has to be no longer than 12 hours. You can finish your rental and immediately take another bike and start the next rental, but each rental has a limit of 12 hours.

Let me know if you have other questions, I am happy to help.

comments.text: Monthly Pakage T-1

comments.author: 712020:d0e4092f-b8dc-4f7e-9058-cd8d92b95196
comments.text:
Here‚Äôs how it works:

The monthly plan gives you unlimited access to our e-bikes for 30 days from the activation date.

Each ride can last up to 12 hours, and the bike must be returned to the same hub where the rental started.

You can start and return the bike any time during hub operating hours, as most hubs are available 24/7.

Monthly subscriptions are available at different prices depending on the hub location starting from ¬£159.95 up to ¬£179.95.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:6e65b64c-a447-4b39-829b-3fa64e43acd8
comments.text: [image file]

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Please note that it is your responsibility to ensure the bike is locked through the app whenever you leave it unattended, even for a few seconds. This helps prevent misuse or theft during your rental period.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:6e65b64c-a447-4b39-829b-3fa64e43acd8
comments.text: I put it outside and locked it. What does that mean? What do I need to do?

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: You can contact the police they can cut the lock immediately. Otherwise our team can come and cut it, but that will take longer. Since you already have an active rental, contacting the police is likely to be faster and more effective.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:6e65b64c-a447-4b39-829b-3fa64e43acd8
comments.text: You can‚Äôt help me ?

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Please note that your rental has been active for approximately 11 hours and 58 minutes. Kindly be aware that if the rental exceeds the 12-hour limit, a ¬£25 penalty will be applied. This amount must be settled to continue using our services. We recommend returning the bike as soon as possible to avoid any additional charges.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Please note that no one else can lock the bike while it‚Äôs under your rental you are the renter and therefore responsible for it. If someone has locked the bike or taken it, that person should be reported to the police, as locking someone else‚Äôs bike is unlawful.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:6e65b64c-a447-4b39-829b-3fa64e43acd8
comments.text: Okay, I'll call the police, but I wanted to let you know first.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: I can request help from my team, but it might take a while. For immediate assistance, please call 101 and ask the police to come and cut the lock and, tell them your exact location.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:6e65b64c-a447-4b39-829b-3fa64e43acd8
comments.text: Ok thank you

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Let me know if you still face any problem.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Kindly chat here.

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Please return the bike to the hub as soon as possible, as your rental time limit has already been exceeded. The system may automatically end your rental at any time, so kindly do your best to return the bike promptly.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: I‚Äôve checked, and you‚Äôve returned the previous bike and already started a new rental, which indicates your issue has been resolved.

comments.author: 712020:3e48ed1c-5151-4a26-8782-c21abcf59de5
comments.text: We are closing this chat now. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else by opening a new chat, thanks!

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e91f075b-36ab-4cb1-9c76-78e4c742485c
comments.text: Can i rent the bike just for one day ?

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Hey[image file]üö≤

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: Could you explain a bit more what seems to be the issue?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e91f075b-36ab-4cb1-9c76-78e4c742485c
comments.text: I just want to know if that possible can i rent the bike just for one day ?

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text: No sir, the rental time limit for each bike is 12 hours. Please note that if a customer exceeds this time limit, a ¬£25 penalty will be applied for exceeding the rental duration. Each customer must return the bike within the 12-hour timeframe. After returning it, you may rent another bike if you wish to continue using our services.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:e91f075b-36ab-4cb1-9c76-78e4c742485c
comments.text: If i want to rent a bike for 12 hours how much ?

comments.author: 712020:ffd0ea69-61d6-4cfe-91bb-cb09245bb5f4
comments.text:
Please see below information regarding our e-bike rental service:
Rental plans: we offer weekly (7 complete days) and daily passes (expire every day at 23:59). You can use as many e-bikes as you need during the time of the subscription (one at a time). Our hubs are open 24/7.
Price: the price for weekly passes is 49,95 GBP and daily passes 12,95 GBP. Please check availability directly in out Mobile App
Conditions: The e-bikes must be returned to the same hub from where it was rented after each use (12h maximum rental time). Customers are not allowed to take e-bikes home overnight or leave them anywhere else than the hub from where they were rented. You can only rent 1 bike at a time. To rent another bike you need to return the bike you have rented previously.

Please note that if a customer exceeds this time limit, a ¬£25 penalty will be applied for exceeding the rental duration. Each customer must return the bike within the 12-hour timeframe. After returning it, you may rent another bike if you wish to continue using our services. ~C:If i want to rent a bike for 12 hours how much ? ~A:Please see below information regarding our e-bike rental service:
Rental plans: we offer weekly (7 complete days) and daily passes (expire every day at 23:59). You can use as many e-bikes as you need during the time of the subscription (one at a time). Our hubs are open 24/7.
Price: the price for weekly passes is 49,95 GBP and daily passes 12,95 GBP. Please check availability directly in out Mobile App
Conditions: The e-bikes must be returned to the same hub from where it was rented after each use (12h maximum rental time). Customers are not allowed to take e-bikes home overnight or leave them anywhere else than the hub from where they were rented. You can only rent 1 bike at a time. To rent another bike you need to return the bike you have rented previously. ~C:Where i can book by the app please? ~A:You‚Äôll need to open the app, go to the map, and select the hub that‚Äôs most convenient for you. comments.text: I have also ring the alarm system of the bike kindly recovered it from there. As the person who rented the bike, it is important that you attempt to locate it. Since this is considered a stolen bike case, if you are unable to recover it, you will need to file a police report. Please be aware that the penalty for a stolen bike is ¬£2500. Therefore, we urge you to make every effort to find the bike.

comments.text:
You can now end your rental yourself if the bike is docked but the session doesn't close.
How to use it:
Restart the app.
Tap the three dots (top-right) > ‚ÄúHaving trouble ending rental?‚Äù
Follow the steps:
Dock the bike properly
Scan the bike‚Äôs QR code
Then scan the dock‚Äôs QR code
If scanned correctly, the rental will end automatically.

user_summary: Hi, the battery level is below %5 and it goes extremely slow, I don‚Äôt want to cause any accident, I am on the road and making my way back to qpark, what should I do?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:4d298938-1cc1-4a78-9b15-4e6c24ea78a4
comments.text: Hi, the battery level is below %5 and it goes extremely slow, I don‚Äôt want to cause any accident, I am on the road and making my way back to qpark, what should I do?

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Allow me a moment.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: I have checked and your bike's battery level is at 5%. While the pedal assistance may feel limited, the bike is still rideable. There is enough battery remaining to complete your journey and return the bike to the hub.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:4d298938-1cc1-4a78-9b15-4e6c24ea78a4
comments.text: I cannot ride this bike as it is

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:4d298938-1cc1-4a78-9b15-4e6c24ea78a4
comments.text: The bike applies breaks when it reaches 5kmph

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: It is your responsibility to return the bike to the hub. Please keep an eye on the battery level and rental time to avoid such issues in the future.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:4d298938-1cc1-4a78-9b15-4e6c24ea78a4
comments.text: Unfortunately I will leave the bike here, this is extremely dangerous, you shouldn‚Äôt expect riders to risk their lives. It‚Äôs inhumane. How do you ask people to take the bike when the breaks are applied.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: According to our policy, you are not allowed to leave the bike unattended. It is your responsibility to return the bike to the hub safely. Please keep an eye on the battery level and rental time to avoid such issues. I understand your concern, but as per the policy, kindly return the bike to the hub.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Please keep in mind that if the bike is not returned to the same hub or if the rental time is exceeded, a penalty will be applied as per our policy.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: I‚Äôve checked and you are just 1.5 km away from the hub. Kindly return the bike to the same hub to avoid any issues. Once you‚Äôve returned the bike, please let me know here in the chat. I really appreciate your understanding.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: I have checked and confirmed that you have successfully finished your rental and started a new ride. I really appreciate your cooperation and understanding.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: Please let me know if you need any further assistance.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:4d298938-1cc1-4a78-9b15-4e6c24ea78a4
comments.text: Please change your policy, it doesn‚Äôt help.

comments.author: 712020:938aebe2-3534-4413-a71d-6c414201de4b
comments.text: I‚Äôll share your feedback with my team. For now, are you facing any issues?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Sir, I understand your concern, but unfortunately, refunds cannot be issued for unused days within a weekly subscription. The subscription is valid for the full duration once it's activated, regardless of usage.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:7e9b8bf9-71c1-48e9-8e68-8f0a533794d2
comments.text: If it‚Äôs valid for the full duration why do I get charged ¬£25 fine the other day as I‚Äôm on subscription?

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: You were charged due to a violation of our policy. The bike was not returned to the hub within the allowed 12-hour rental period, which led to the rental being forcefully ended and a penalty being applied as a result.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:7e9b8bf9-71c1-48e9-8e68-8f0a533794d2
comments.text: I have been a very nice customer with you guys since Jan, to come and charge ¬£25 fine?

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:7e9b8bf9-71c1-48e9-8e68-8f0a533794d2
comments.text: This is a violation.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: We truly appreciate your loyalty and understand your frustration. Please know that the ¬£25 penalty was applied only due to a policy violation specifically, the bike wasn‚Äôt returned within the 12-hour limit, which triggers the charge. We completely value you as a customer, but unfortunately, we‚Äôre unable to override this rule.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Please let me know if there's anything else that I can assist you with.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text:
Please note that the penalty must be paid first in order for you to continue using the remaining 2 days of your subscription.

Regarding a refund for those 2 days: as per our policy, refund requests must be made within the first 2 days of the subscription period. If a request is made after that window, unfortunately, it is not eligible for a refund.

comments.text: Hi guys, If I take out a bike at 8 pm, until what time do I have to return it? thanks

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Hey[image file]

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Each rental is limited to 12 hours, you need to return the bike back to the hub and finish your rental within the limit of 12 hours, after that you can immediately take another bike from the hub for another 12 hours.

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:18856cd6-a797-4d6f-a03b-0e416aa0d808
comments.text: So, 8pm to 8am

comments.author: qm:bd5a4d40-24e3-41ea-97b7-f62e0a9396fd:18856cd6-a797-4d6f-a03b-0e416aa0d808
comments.text: Thank guys, Today I used their bikes for the first time and I loved them. The only bad thing is that the London Bridge bathroom was dirty and without toilet paper.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text: Yes, you have to return the bike before the rental time exceeds as exceeding the allowed time results in the rental being force finished and a penalty being applied.

comments.author: 712020:4a1cd5f8-3026-4f9f-9e90-f389b942d0d6
comments.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words! We‚Äôre really glad to hear you loved using our bikes for the first time. We truly appreciate your feedback about the London Bridge bathroom we‚Äôll pass this on to the maintenance team right away to get it cleaned and restocked.

If there‚Äôs anything else we can do to make your experience even better, please don‚Äôt hesitate to let us know!

comments.text:
:white_check_mark: You can now transfer your active weekly subscription to another hub ‚Äî if it has available slots.
:arrows_counterclockwise: How It Works:
If you have an active subscription and tap on a different hub:
If the new hub has open weekly slots, you‚Äôll see the ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù button.
If it‚Äôs sold out, you‚Äôll only see ‚ÄúCheck hub details‚Äù, as before.
Tap ‚ÄúTransfer my subscription‚Äù to:
View the new hub‚Äôs details.
Start the transfer process.
During the transfer:
Your current subscription will be cancelled.
A new one will start in the selected hub.
You‚Äôll receive a discount based on the unused time left on your original subscription.
A small transfer fee of ¬£5 applies at checkout.
